name: Celestial
description: Your body's toughness and resilience to damage are out of this world.
//: can't find the fire and laser resistence field names, used heat instead
//2: I have no idea how this works, this should cover minor to some medium blood damage, such as zombie scratchs and maybe someone without sword proficiencies hitting Tenko with a sword

name: Gyokuto
description: You're a Moon rabbit. Your kind was [REDACTED] by the Lunarians to serve them like tools. Not that you mind (that much), as you're naturally carefree. How convenient.

name: Half-human half-phantom
description: Not fully human, yet not fully inhuman, you have the best of both worlds. Also, your phantom half is always following around.
//: Recheck this after adding the ghosts and youkai enemies

name: Hell raven
description: You're a raven youkai originating from (Former) Hell.
//: can't find the fire resistence field name to add it, used heat instead
//2: Can't find how to use percentage dmg reduction, this value should be 66% of all received fire damage + base say, 4, so it blocks minor fire attacks instead of being completely immune
//3: Above should be negative wet protection (200% final demerit), not sure how those values work. Also, replace if I find a way to add some kind of water weakness other than moral bonus

name: Hourai person
description: Your drank from the accursed Hourai Elixir ages ago. You ceased to age, you never become ill, and you will never die. At least that's how it was before the Cataclysm.
//: Is there a way to implement actual immortality? Not just fast health regen but something that blocks hp going below 1, and slowly (days) regenerates lost limbs and such. If so, remove the healing above

name: Kasha
description: You're a feline-looking youkai originating from (Former) Hell.
//: Above should be negative wet protection (200% final demerit), not sure how those values work. Also, replace if I find a way to add some kind of water weakness other than moral bonus
//2: can't find the fire resistence field name to add it, used heat instead
//3: Can't find how to use percentage dmg reduction, this value should be 66% of all received fire damage + base say, 4, so it blocks minor fire attacks instead of being completely immune
//4: Also, add like 2-4 soul dmg reduction when I implement that
//5: Also, add some kind of social bonus for enemies with both the UNDEAD and SPIRIT/SOUL trait, this would allow for Vengeful spirits be neutral/friendly to her and not also affect every single Zed out there

name: Non-human
description: You're fundamentally not human despite looking like one, and thus you're not bound by their customs and rules. You're 'just' 'off'.
//: I need to set the penalty (and bonus) of eating human flesh to 0

name: Crow Tengu
description: A member of the ancient and strictly hierarchical Tengu, you're agile and nimble, and your job is to gather information.
//: These bonuses should apply ONLY with the character in a running state (it is, 200% running speed). This way I can set the walking speed to something like 1.2
//2: I'm putting TOLERANCE there because I can't find a way to set alcohol immunity only to something like 95%

name: Tsuchigumo
description: You're a spider youkai originating from caves and dark places in the Earth.
//1: Can't find how to use percentage dmg reduction, thse values should be 66% of all received acid (and biological) damage  + base say, 4, so it blocks minor fire attacks instead of being completely immune
//2: Supposedly the ACID_BARF attack from the acid zombie is hardcoded in C++ so I can't check the values of acid attacks in general to use a base value for that reduction. If anything, I want to set 0-2 received dmg from the base acid zombie attack
//3: Also, add some kind of social bonus for enemies with the YOUKAI trait or plus ARACHNID. In fact I should probably check all social interactions of Youkai in general at some point

name: Vampire
description: A very famous Western youkai, you must feed upon humans to survive. You're powerful, but at the same have time lots of weaknesses.
//: Add ALBINO trait here, but do like a lot of heat damage on affected body parts instead + generate ash + remove the pain/morale demerit because you, a vampire, are used to it and don't fucking care
//2: Add ALBINO trait but for rain and flowing water (i.e. rivers but not pools) + deal a lot of cold damage and DON'T remove the demerits because it actually hurts
//3: Add BLOODTHIRST trait that makes you crave blood and get debuffed if you go long enough without it. Check for PYROMANIA code for reference
//4: I want to set the default passive regen high, and double or triple the active regen, but that should only be done after feasting with human blood
//5: ANIMALDISCORD should be a base trait for vampires, but I don't undersand how the actual mutation works
//6: I will change this flag for something else. I need to set the penalty (and bonus) of eating human flesh to 0, but add a bonus for eating human blood or RBC instead
//7: Add something that enables hibernation AND also enables to ignore sleep needs BUT not tiredness.

name: Youkai
description: You're fundamentally not human despite looking like one, and thus you're not bound by their customs and rules. You naturally also find them appetizing.
//: *VERY IMPORTANT* I need to recheck these stats because they stack with all the sub-species and sub-subspecies
//2: I need to set the penalty (and bonus) of eating human flesh to 0
//3: There are peaceful youkai, so I need to further divide this into subspecies such as 'Vampire'
//4: I can't find a way to modify pain resistant, Youkai should have it at 0.5-0.66 for physical attacks or something
//5: I can't find a way to completely block stuff like ASTHMA

name: Spiritual energy user
description: Magic, mana, qi, energy, all of it can also be described as spiritual energy.  You naturally generate it over time.
//: This equals a full mana pool every 40 minutes or so

name: Wind god girl
description: You're a member of the Tengu, specifically of the Crow caste.
//: If my math is correct, this should be equivalent to 300% movement speed *final*, up from the 200% movement speed from base crow tengu
//3: If possible, add some passive that multiplies every proyectile she throws to 1.5 - 2.0 movement speed
//4: Add wings (small) and see if there's flying as mechanic. The problem is, how do I make those wings not interfer with her clothing?

name: The Devil's Destructive Little Sister
description: You're the little sister of the Scarlet Devil.
//2: Both Remi and Flan have the countertrait 'Light Eater' for the BLOODTHIRST trait, that makes the long enough -> very long.

name: Gyokuto ears
description: Your pair of rabbit ears look normal to you but unlike anything to everyone else.

name: Gyokuto tail
description: You have a fluffy little rabbit tail.

name: Corpse carrier cheering hellcat
description: WIP

name: Immortal Guide of the Bamboo Forest
description: Your countless years of fighting your rival has granted you lots of fighting skills, primarily with kicking attacks.
